ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T16:22:36 [Issue ID 4000-807417] urn:comicvine:4000-807417 urn:comixology:881914 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 22:14:25. [Issue ID 2161838]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Skye’s shocking revelation last issue is going to lead her on a quest for information from an unfriendly source. Also, something has made its way out of the book unbeknownst to Skye and the havoc it may wreak will soon be shown.
Be sure not to miss this next issue!
